response.headline: Manga drawing workshop in Tokyo's Nakano area with professional Japanese artist using authentic tools
response.summary: Learn to draw manga with a professional artist in Tokyo's Nakano area. Workshop includes real manga tools and participants take home their finished artwork. Suitable for beginners or experienced artists.

extracted_text: MANGA LESSON WITH A PROFESSIONAL JAPANESE MANGA ARTIST
Learn to draw manga with a pro artist in Tokyo's Nakano area. Use real manga tools and take home your finished artwork - perfect for beginners or experienced artists.
Custom workshops for your trip! Guide in bio
